kizuna_botan_c_02:
I’ve never been inside the art room before.
It smells like paint in here—but in a good way.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_04:
I’m worried about this rumor that’s going round.\c
People are saying Team Star’s planning to raid
the art room or something.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_05:
It’s probably just rubbish made up by some kids
who are still scared of Team Star though.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_06:
My friends would never do anything like that.
And who’d want to raid the art room, anyway?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_01:
Wow, this Staraptor is incredible! It looks just like
it’s about to attack with Close Combat![npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_02: Hey. You with the art club or what?[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_08:
Don’t tell me that rumor was for real! Are they
actually gonna raid the art room?![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_09:
N-no, there’s no way. They wouldn’t. We should
just keep watching...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_student_02: So, um, did...did you need anything?
kizuna_botan_c_hono_04: Um, yeah. I, uh...I’m here to ask...you know...if...[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_05: IF YOU GOT ANY LAST WORDS, PUNK![npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_10: No WAY! It’s a raid! This is literally a RAID![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_03:
Being shy is one thing, but you can’t go around
threatening people to cover it up![npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_07:
So, uh...about your club. The art club, I mean.
I, um...I was wondering if...I...could join...[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_student_04:
Oh! You wanted to ask about club membership!
Sheesh, you had me scared there!
kizuna_botan_c_student_05:
We’re open to any students who want to join.
But, uhhh...
kizuna_botan_c_hono_08:
Hang on, Eri. This guy’s still got somethin’ to say.\c
Spit it out, then. I gotta earn my way in or what?[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_student_06:
Ah, no, it’s just— I was hoping I could ask what
prompted you to go for the art club, that’s all.
kizuna_botan_c_hono_09:
You’re askin’ me why I wanna join? Well, if I
gotta explain...[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_10:
One of my pals made this outfit for me.
These sick boots and everythin’.[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_11:
I’m big into flame patterns like this, so...I wanna
try and make somethin’ like it myself.[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_12: So. Yeah. PAINTING! That’s what I wanna do![npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_13: I’m a total newbie at it, but...[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_hono_14:
I realized somethin’ when I saw that real simple-
lookin’ Fletchling painting on the wall there.\c
I don’t hafta be some genius artist. I just wanna
make art that has its own charm, y’know?[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_student_07: The Fletchling painting? Um...I did that one.
kizuna_botan_c_hono_15:
That one’s YOURS?! I thought it was, like, a
finger painting by a kindergartener or something![npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_student_08: Ha ha! Yeah, I get that all the time.
kizuna_botan_c_mobs_01:
Our president’s paintings are real lovable ’cause
they’re real simple! Everyone says so!
kizuna_botan_c_hono_16: HUH? You’re the art club’s PRESIDENT?[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_mobs_02:
I can already tell we’ll have a lot of fun in the
club together! Could you tell us your name?
kizuna_botan_c_mobs_03: Your boots are awesome! Can I get a closer look?
kizuna_botan_c_hono_17:
Th-the name’s Mela... And yeah, good eye!
My boots are the best. A pal of mine who’s a\r
big arts-and-crafts nerd made them for me.[npcn:1F]
kizuna_botan_c_11:
So the raid thing was just a misunderstanding...\c
Well, that’s a relief. But wow...I didn’t know that
Mellie wanted to join the art club.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_05:
I can’t wait to see what Mellie paints! I bet it’ll be
something amazing, huh?[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_13: GAH! Eri?! How’d you know we were here?![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_06:
Wait, were you supposed to be hiding?\c
I was wondering what was going on—you were
just kinda hanging out in the open over here...[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_07:
But you don’t need to worry anyway. Mellie’s
been too nervous to notice you.[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_14: Wow. So even Mellie gets the jitters sometimes.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_08:
Trying new things is scary for everyone.
That’s why I came with her for moral support.\r
But you know? I think she’ll be just fine.[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_09:
And she’s not the only one doing something new!
Carmen and I have started up a wrestling club.[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_10:
Mellie will have a blast here, I’m sure, so I gotta
keep up with her! I’ll enjoy the time I have left at\r
the academy as much as I can![npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_kakutou_11:
Anyway, it was nice bumping into you both!
Hasta la vistar! ☆[npcn:22]
kizuna_botan_c_16:
Mellie and Eri really are putting themselves out
there, aren’t they.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_c_17: I...I guess I’ll head off, too. Hasta la vistar... ☆[npcn:8]
